title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.3 - Driver license and vehicle registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.3 - Driver license and vehicle registration

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle in or upon any
part of a vehicular crossing unless he is duly authorized to operate motor
vehicles in the State in which such part of the vehicular crossing is located. No motor vehicle shall be permitted in or upon any part of a vehicular crossing
which is not registered in accordance with the provisions of the law of the

State in which such part of the vehicular crossing is
located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1201.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
